name: Xccelerate
description: All About Xccelerate Check out Xccelerate's operating guides and features! Twitter/X Promotional Campaigns Leverage the power of community and promote your Hashtag (#) and Cashtag ($) with Xccelerate! Through the use of incentives and crowdsourcing, your project can reach a greater audience and break out of the norm. Unique Project Hashtag (#) and Cashtag ($) Reservations Ensures Organic User-Created Content associated with your Community on Twitter/X Distribution covered by Xccelerate General Overview of $XLRT Utilities Staking + Campaign Revenue Sharing 25% of each Twitter/X Promotional Campaign's fees will be directly contributed to a pool that will be shared with all $XLRT stakers. Rewards accumulate in real-time and will be updated to our claim database every 24 hours! 25% of All Revenue Shared among $XLRT Stakers Only Staked $XLRT Generates Revenue Share Paid in $ETH No Locking Periods for Staked $XLRT Revenue Share Giving Back to $XLRT Holders Xccelerate ($XLRT) provides holders with a means to collect Ethereum ($ETH) through our Revenue Share program. 25% of each Twitter/X Promotional Campaign's fees will be directly contributed to a pool that will be shared with all $XLRT stakers. Rewards accumulate in real-time as campaigns are created and will be updated to our claim database and contract every 24 hours. Features 25% of All Revenue Shared among $XLRT Stakers Proportional Rewards, Owning more $XLRT = more Revenue Shared Rewards Claimable in $ETH Rewards Accumulate in Real-Time, Claimable after 24-Hours No Locked Staking Periods Tokenomics $XLRT Buy/Sell Tax is 0%. All Revenue is generated through Campaign Fees.
